[i]Sabotage[/i] – Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirrorcast Battlemage.
Remove three +1/+1 counters from Mirrorcast Battlemage: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Activate only once each turn.
